short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates words on a webpage; slide up to include more of the most frequent words

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension meant to help English readers learn Portuguese. It translates words on a page; the user can adjust how many of the most frequently used words get translated, to match their pace of language learning. At the final setting, it translates the 5000 most common words which should cover 95% of text. At this level of lexical coverage, missing vocabulary can often be inferred from context.
